UserPref.name: address
UserPref.default_value: Ex: 10000 E Constable Ct Fairfax VA

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.3.2/jquery.js">
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

	var gadget = {
		moduleId: __MODULE_ID__,
		year: 2009,
		baseUrl: 'http://election-gadgets.googlecode.com/hg/voter-info/'
	};
	
	function script( url, seconds ) {
		document.write(
			'<script type="text/javascript" src="',
				_IG_GetCachedUrl( url, { refreshInterval:seconds } ),
			'">',
			'<\/script>'
		);
	}
	
	script( gadget.baseUrl + 'voter-info-map.js', 60 );
	
</script>
